gobblin.runtime.spec_catalog

Class TopologyCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • gobblin.runtime.spec_catalog.TopologyCatalog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service, Instrumentable, MutableSpecCatalog, SpecCatalog, SpecCatalogListenersContainer, SpecSerDe

    @Alpha
public class TopologyCatalog
extends AbstractIdleService
implements SpecCatalog, MutableSpecCatalog, SpecSerDe

      • addListener

        public void addListener(SpecCatalogListener specListener)
        Description copied from interface: SpecCatalogListenersContainer
        Adds a SpecCatalogListener that will be invoked upon updates on the SpecCatalog. Upon registration SpecCatalogListener.onAddSpec(Spec) will be invoked for all pre-existing specs in the SpecCatalog.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface SpecCatalogListenersContainer

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(SpecCatalogListener specCatalogListener)
        Description copied from interface: SpecCatalogListenersContainer
        Removes the specified listener. No-op if not registered.
        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface SpecCatalogListenersContainer

      • registerWeakSpecCatalogListener

        public void registerWeakSpecCatalogListener(SpecCatalogListener specCatalogListener)
        Description copied from interface: SpecCatalogListenersContainer
        Like SpecCatalogListenersContainer.addListener(SpecCatalogListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed using SpecCatalogListenersContainer.removeListener(SpecCatalogListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakSpecCatalogListener in interface SpecCatalogListenersContainer
